description: Silicon Labs Thunderboard tap that collect environmental data - temperature, uv, ambient light - from a physical device.
label: Thunderboard
name: thunderboard

settings.name: mode
settings.label: Mode
settings.description:
'dump' mode scans for devices and dumps measurements continuously

'file' mode processes the `filename` in the `dataDirectory`

settings.name: dataDirectory
settings.label: Data Directory
settings.description: The local directory where thunderboard data can be found (Required for 'file' `mode`)

settings.name: filename
settings.label: Filename
settings.description: The name of the file in the `dataDirectory` to be processed (Required for 'file' `mode`)

settings.name: truncate
settings.label: Truncate
settings.description: Remove file contents after processing (Optional. Default - true)

settings.name: deviceId
settings.label: Device ID
settings.description: Limit output from discovered thunderboards to a specific `deviceId` (Optional)
